Name: Barth syndrome
Definition: A lipid metabolism disorder that has_material_basis_in X-linked inheritance of the tafazzin gene and is characterized by decreased production of an enzyme required to produce cardiolipin.

Name: carnitine palmitoyltransferase II deficiency
Definition: A lipid metabolism disorder characterized by an enzymatic defect that prevents long-chain fatty acids from being transported into the mitochondria.
Synonym: lethal neonatal carnitine palmitoyltransferase II deficiency

Name: chylomicron retention disease
Definition: A lipid metabolism disorder characterized by malnutrition

Name: medium chain acyl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency
Definition: A lipid metabolism disorder that is characterized by a deficiency of the enzyme medium chain acyl-CoA dehydrogenase that results in the inability to convert medium chain fatty acids to energy

Name: short chain acyl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency
Definition: A lipid metabolism disorder that is characterized by deficiency of the enzyme short chain acyl-CoA dehydrogenase that results in the inability to convert short chain fatty acids.

Name: very long chain acyl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency
Definition: A lipid metabolism disorder that is characterized by deficiency of the enzyme very long chain acyl-CoA dehydrogenase that results in the inability to convert very long chain fatty acids.

Name: multiple congenital anomalies-hypotonia-seizures syndrome
Definition: A lipid metabolism disorder that is characterized by phosphatidylinositol glycan anchor biosynthesis class A (PIGA) deficiency.

Name: carnitine palmitoyltransferase I deficiency
Definition: A lipid metabolism disorder that is characterized by impaired mitochondrial oxidation of long chain fatty acids in the liver and kidneys resulting in episodes of illness- or fasting-induced hypoketotic hypoglycemia

Name: mitochondrial trifunctional protein deficiency
Definition: A lipid metabolism disorder characterized by abnormal fatty acid oxidation resulting a wide range of clinical manifestations from servere neonatal symptoms including cardiomyopathy

Name: Refsum disease
Definition: A sphingolipidosis characterized by the accumulation of sulfatides in cells

Name: familial hyperlipidemia
Definition: A filariasis that involves parasitic infection caused by the nematode Onchocerca volvulus

Name: obsolete ocular onchocerciasis
Definition: A onchocerciasis that involves parasitic infection of the eye by the larvae of Onchocerca volvulus. The microfilariae migrate to the surface of the cornea. Punctate keratitis occurs in the infected area. In severe infection

Name: obsolete glaucoma associated with systemic syndromes
Definition: A onchocerciasis that involves parasitic infection of the eye by the larvae of Onchocerca volvulus. The microfilariae migrate to the surface of the cornea. Punctate keratitis occurs in the infected area. In severe infection

Name: hypolipoproteinemia
Definition: A labyrinthitis which is an infectious inflammatory disease of a circumscribed area of either the vestibular or the cochlear portion of the labyrinth

Name: lipoid proteinosis
Definition: A primary systemic mycosis that results_in a systemic fungal infection

Name: Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome
Definition: An osteochondrodysplasia that has_material_basis_in abnormal cartilage development due to mutations in the SLC26A2 gene which results_in short limb dwarfism.

Name: steroid inherited metabolic disorder
Definition: A lipid metabolism disorder that involves defects in steroid metabolism.
